HOME.title: GPUcloud.store – One stop shop for your HPC needs
HOME.description: GPUcloud.store – GPU cloud consulting, multi-cloud orchestration, and hybrid cloud implementation for high-performance computing workloads.

hero.headline: One stop shop for your
hero.subtitle: GPUcloud.store helps teams design and operate efficient GPU-first infrastructure – from multi-cloud orchestration to hybrid setups that include on-prem hardware. We cut through the noise, so your workloads scale instead of your burn.
hero.meta: Based in the EU. Connected to providers and partners across Europe and beyond.

card.title: HPC Control Panel
card.footnote: Multi-cloud & hybrid setups don't have to be a maze.
card.footnoteHighlight: We design the map, introduce the right providers, and help you ship.

about.title: Who's behind GPUcloud.store?
about.subtitle: GPUcloud.store is built around a simple idea: high-performance infrastructure should be understandable, negotiable, and aligned with your business goals – not just your benchmarks.

text.intro: We are cloud consultants with a global Independent Datacenter network powered by Si Exchange.
text.mission: We sit at the intersection of technical infrastructure, commercial reality, and cross-border networks. That means helping you choose not just the "fastest hardware", but the architecture and partnerships that actually move your roadmap forward.
text.approach: With access to a broad network of independent datacenters and GPU providers, we help you navigate capacity, pricing, and reliability while keeping your teams focused on building products — not chasing hardware.

orchestration.title: Multi-cloud orchestration:
orchestration.text: Evaluate and design setups across major providers and specialized GPU clouds.

hybrid.title: Hybrid implementations:
hybrid.text: Combine on-prem or colocation hardware with cloud capacity in a way that doesn't become operational hell.

sourcing.title: Vendor & hardware sourcing:
sourcing.text: Help you navigate GPU availability, pricing, and trusted partners in independent datacenters worldwide.

alignment.title: Cost & growth alignment:
alignment.text: Translate infra decisions into KPI impact: throughput, latency, margin, and runway.

contact.title: Tell us about your workloads
contact.subtitle: Whether you're fighting GPU scarcity, unpredictable invoices, or a messy multi-cloud setup, we can start with a short, focused conversation.

text.intro: Use the form to outline your current situation: what you're running, where it's running, and what's not working the way it should.

helpItems.ai: AI / ML teams scaling training or inference
helpItems.startups: Startups moving from single-cloud to multi-cloud
helpItems.companies: Companies considering hybrid or on-prem GPU fleets

text.response: You'll get a direct response — no automated sales sequence, no generic deck.
text.email: Prefer email? You can also reach out at

message.label: What are you running today?
message.placeholder: Briefly describe your workloads, current providers, and what you want to improve (cost, reliability, latency, capacity, etc.).

cards.title: Instant GPU Power
cards.description: Spin up high-performance GPUs in seconds for your most demanding workloads.

cards.title: Predictable Pricing
cards.description: Transparent hourly billing with no surprise fees or long-term lock-in.

cards.title: Global Availability
cards.description: Deploy close to your users with low-latency regions around the world.

gpuTypes.description: NVIDIA A100 GPU with 80GB HBM2e memory
gpuTypes.shortDetails: Best for multi-node training runs with large models and long training windows.

providers.name: Provider Alpha
providers.shortDetails: Best for multi-node training runs with large models and long training windows.
providers.details: Hosted in Tier III+ datacenters with redundant cooling systems and 2N power architecture. Facilities feature evaporative cooling towers with backup chillers, supporting 8kW per rack thermal density. Power sourced from regional grid with 99.999% uptime SLA, backed by on-site diesel generators and battery systems. Located in moderate climate zone with seismic-resistant construction and comprehensive environmental monitoring. Network connectivity through multiple Tier 1 carriers with 100Gbps backbone capacity.

providers.name: Provider Beta
providers.shortDetails: European datacenter option with strong compliance and data residency features.
providers.details: Located in GDPR-compliant European datacenters with advanced cooling systems. Power infrastructure includes redundant feeds with automatic transfer switches. Buildings constructed with earthquake-resistant design. High-speed connectivity through multiple European network providers.

gpuTypes.description: NVIDIA H100 GPU with 96GB HBM3 memory
gpuTypes.shortDetails: Great for mixed inference + fine-tuning workloads with strong BF16/FP8 performance.

providers.name: Provider Gamma
providers.shortDetails: Great for mixed inference + fine-tuning workloads with strong BF16/FP8 performance.
providers.details: Deployed in coastal datacenters with advanced immersion cooling technology, achieving PUE ratings below 1.05. Dual-sourced power from municipal grid and on-site solar/wind hybrid system with 8-hour battery backup. Facilities engineered for Category 5 hurricane resistance with elevated construction and flood mitigation systems. 400Gbps network connectivity with direct peering to major cloud providers. Comprehensive environmental controls maintain ±1°C temperature stability with real-time humidity monitoring.

gpuTypes.description: NVIDIA L40S GPU with 48GB GDDR6 memory
gpuTypes.shortDetails: Balanced choice for latency-sensitive inference and smaller training workloads.

providers.name: Provider Gamma
providers.shortDetails: Balanced choice for latency-sensitive inference and smaller training workloads.
providers.details: Located in continental datacenters with geothermal-assisted cooling systems, reducing carbon footprint by 40%. Power infrastructure includes redundant utility feeds with automatic transfer switches and extended runtime UPS systems. Buildings constructed to withstand F3 tornado conditions with reinforced concrete foundations and overhead protection. 200Gbps network capacity with multiple internet exchanges and dark fiber connectivity. Advanced fire suppression systems and 24/7 security with biometric access controls.

providers.name: Provider Delta
providers.shortDetails: European mid-tier option with good performance-to-cost ratio.
providers.details: Central European datacenters with efficient cooling and reliable power infrastructure. Modern facilities with good connectivity and security measures. Suitable for production inference workloads with moderate latency requirements.

gpuTypes.description: NVIDIA RTX 4090 GPU with 24GB GDDR6X memory
gpuTypes.shortDetails: Ideal for experiments, prototyping, and heavy local development workloads.

providers.name: Provider Epsilon
providers.shortDetails: Ideal for experiments, prototyping, and heavy local development workloads.
providers.details: Hosted in urban datacenters with district heating integration and waste heat recovery systems. Primary power from local municipal grid with secondary feed from adjacent facility. Buildings designed for urban seismic zones with base isolation systems. 100Gbps connectivity through metro fiber rings with carrier-neutral design. Comprehensive access controls with CCTV, intrusion detection, and 24/7 manned security. Emergency response protocols coordinated with local authorities.

gpuTypes.description: NVIDIA A100 GPU with 80GB HBM2e memory (16 GPUs)
gpuTypes.shortDetails: For the largest training jobs requiring maximum VRAM and bandwidth.

providers.name: Provider Zeta
providers.shortDetails: For the largest training jobs requiring maximum VRAM and bandwidth.
providers.details: Located in high-altitude datacenters leveraging natural cooling for 30% energy reduction. Power infrastructure includes hydroelectric-sourced electricity with grid-tied solar backup and 24-hour fuel cell systems. Facilities built to withstand extreme weather conditions with avalanche protection and permafrost-resistant foundations. 800Gbps network connectivity through undersea cable systems with multiple landing stations. Advanced thermal management with phase-change cooling supporting 15kW per rack. Comprehensive disaster recovery protocols with off-site data mirroring.

gpuTypes.description: AMD MI300X GPU with 192GB HBM3 memory
gpuTypes.shortDetails: AMD-based alternative for massive inference and ROCm-compatible training.

providers.name: Provider Eta
providers.shortDetails: AMD-based alternative for massive inference and ROCm-compatible training.
providers.details: Deployed in Nordic datacenters utilizing seawater cooling systems for optimal thermal efficiency. Primary power from nuclear and hydroelectric sources with 99.99% grid reliability. Structures designed for subarctic conditions with thermal insulation and snow-load resistance. 400Gbps connectivity through Arctic cable systems with redundant routing. Multi-layered security with military-grade encryption and compliance certifications. Environmental monitoring includes radiation detection and air quality sensors for comprehensive risk assessment.

help.title: What we can help with:
help.description: Stuck on something? Our team can help you choose the right mix of hardware, cloud providers, or hybrid architecture. Feel free to share roadblocks or wishlist items—we'll factor it into your quote.
help.emailIntro: You can also email us directly at
